name: PASHMINA -MUSTARD YELLOW
title: PASHMINA -MUSTARD YELLOW
description:
Premium Reversible Paisley Pashmina Hijab & Shawl
Elevate your style with this exquisitely crafted reversible pashmina, an essential accessory for elegance and warmth. Perfect for use as a luxurious hijab, a cozy shawl, or a sophisticated evening wrap.

Generous Coverage: The expansive dimensions make it ideal for various styling options, ensuring beautiful draping and full, modest coverage.
Perfect Size: Measures a substantial 2 meters \times 1 meter (approximately 78.7 inches \times 39.4 inches).
Versatile Styling: A must-have accessory that transitions effortlessly across seasons and occasionsâ€”from daily wear to formal events.
